rooms.name: entrance foyer
rooms.description: An inviting open space with Bohemian decor and natural materials for immediate impact.

rooms.name: living-dining area
rooms.description: A spacious combined living and dining area that embodies Bohemian charm through eclectic furnishings and vibrant textiles. Incorporates Vastu principles by aligning the main door with a peaceful north-east direction.

rooms.name: home office
rooms.description: A dedicated workspace designed to enhance productivity while maintaining a Bohemian aesthetic. Large windows allow ample natural light following Vastu guidelines for concentration and positive energy.

rooms.name: kitchenette
rooms.description: A compact yet functional kitchen designed with an open concept to allow flow between cooking space and dining area. Utilizes local building norms by incorporating fire safety measures and efficient layout.

rooms.name: bathroom
rooms.description: A modern bathroom with a blend of rustic and Bohemian design elements, ensuring water drainage adheres to Vastu principles.
